plot: When an unknown person approaches his compound, survivalist Bill forges an unlikely connection. Later, Joel and Ellie seek Bill's guidance.

After the death of Tess, Joel and Ellie head to the house of his friends Frank and Bill. They stop at a gas station where Joel has stashed supplies. They proceed their journey and find a pit of skeletons and bones where FEDRA has killed many citizens since the quarantine zone was crowded. Meanwhile, in flashback, the encounter of Bill and Frank in Lincoln is disclosed till their deaths.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
